name: The hardest platformer- Save Suzzane
description:
WASD or arrow keys to move, space bar to jump. Save Suzzane the Monkey after passing a perilous journey!

Music: Faded by Alan Walker, lofi version by lofi viara 

Across the Stars by John Williams lofi version by Closed on Sunday 

Loki Theme by Natalie Holt lofi version by Samuel Kim
